amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in House Report 113-170 to protect DoD civilians' security clearances.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to deny security clearance to civillian employees of the Department of Defense due to a "furlough caused by sequestration".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 142 (Roll no. 407).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
